 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1713&user=10620> 	

We’ve built One Chalhoub together, and now it’s time to make it even better — with YOU.
Drop your thoughts, ideas, and feedback in our short survey <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1713&user=10620> . 
We’re ready to listen and improve!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Molton Brown Flash Sale

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1714&user=10620> 	



Step into summer with indulgence. 

For a limited time only, enjoy 30% off our curated selection of bath, body and fragrance icons.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

Maison Margiela Exclusive Sale

For a limited time only, enjoy 30% off our curated selection of bath, body and fragrance icons.

Maison Margiela Exclusive Sale

The sale continues, enjoy special access on selected lines at Maison Margiela Dubai Mall and Mall of the Emirates.

Offer exclusively for Chalhoub Group team members (Chalhoub ID or One Chalhoub profile will be required), valid until August 31.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/3ea064f7f1e5ee80be7b9891baef8fac1270870540.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1715&user=10620> 	

Visit our Chalhoub Career Site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1715&user=10620>  for all our vacancies and use your Chalhoub email address to be recognized as Internal!
